Oct. 4, 2014 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Bro Gwaun School, Fishguard, Pembrokeshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Gareth Ritter (euphonium) - City of Cardiff M2 Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100 8 bands competed.
Oct. 6, 2014, 6:55 p.m. July 4, 2020, 9:43 p.m.
